movies.title: Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity
movies.originalTitle: I quattro pistoleri di Santa Trinità
movies.plot: Arms trafficking with the Indians on the one hand and acquiring documents concerning the ownership of a goldmine on the other are the principal interests of Quin and Gomez, the highly suspicious guests at Papa Martinez' inn.
movies.simplePlot: Arms trafficking with the Indians on the one hand and acquiring documents concerning the ownership of a goldmine on the other are the principal interests of Quin and Gomez, the highly suspicious guests at Papa Martinez' inn.

biography.bio: Blond German youth Peter Lee Lawrence, who made his uncredited debut in Sergio Leone "For A Few Dollars More" (1965), was the hero in many Spaghetti Westerns. His short cinematographic history can be enclosed in nine years of Italo-Spain co-productions. His recent films include thriller-drama "Giorni d'amore sul filo di una lama" (1973), where he played with his long time partner, the blond German actress Erica Blanc, and Italian horror "Bacio di una morta" (1974). In 1972 Lawrence began suffering from headaches. Once filming finished on Los Caballeros del Botón de Ancla, he was admitted to the Foundation Jimenez Diaz Hospital in Madrid, where he was operated on by Dr. Sixto Obrador. The surgery was a success, but the biopsy report revealed it was glioblastoma. He moved to Zurich, where, under the auspices of Professor Wolfgang Horst, he began both chemo and radium treatment. On the 25th of March 1974, Lawrence was admitted to the Villa Stuart Clinic in Rome with severe stomach pains. He died on April 20th 1974, at ten past three in the morning. At the time of his death he was married to actress Cristina Galbó.
biography.name: Peter Lee Lawrence

biography.bio: Ida Galli was born on March 9, 1939 in Sestola, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. She is an actress, known for La Dolce Vita (1960), The Leopard (1963) and Maniac Mansion (1972).
biography.name: Ida Galli

biography.bio: Raf Baldassarre was born on January 17, 1932 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Raffaele Baldassarre. He was an actor, known for The Great Silence (1968), The Mercenary (1968) and Les cavaliers sans peur (1963). He died on January 17, 1995 in Italy.
biography.name: Raf Baldassarre

biography.bio: Valeria Fabrizi was born on October 28, 1938 in Verona, Veneto, Italy. She is an actress, known for Notte prima degli esami (2006), Il seme della discordia (2008) and Sei forte, Maestro (2000). She was previously married to Tata Giacobetti.
biography.name: Valeria Fabrizi

biography.bio: Salvatore Furnari is an actor, known for Hercules and the Captive Women (1961), Goliath and the Dragon (1960) and The Christmas That Almost Wasn't (1966).
biography.name: Salvatore Furnari

biography.bio: Daniela Giordano was born on November 7, 1947 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy. She is known for her work on Four Times that Night (1971), The Girl in Room 2A (1974) and Inquisition (1978).
biography.name: Daniela Giordano

biography.bio: Philippe Hersent was born on July 26, 1912 in Ecommoy, France. He was an actor, known for Conversation Piece (1974), L'innocent (1976) and Les géants de Rome (1964). He was married to Célina Cély and Simone Mareuil. He died on December 30, 1982.
biography.name: Philippe Hersent

biography.bio: Antonella Murgia is an actress, known for Fontamara (1980), Anguish (1987) and Texas, Adios (1966).
biography.name: Antonella Murgia

biography.bio: Antonio Pierfederici was born on March 18, 1919 in La Maddalena, Sardinia, Italy. He was an actor, known for Romeo and Juliet (1968), Black Sunday (1960) and Otello (1986). He died on January 6, 1999 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Antonio Pierfederici

biography.bio: Daniele Vargas was born on April 20, 1922 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy as Daniele Pitani. He was an actor, known for Cemetery Without Crosses (1969), Une vie difficile (1961) and The Arena (1974). He died on January 7, 1992 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Daniele Vargas

biography.bio: Paul Oxon is an actor, known for So Sweet, So Dead (1972), Simbad et le calife de Bagdad (1973) and 4 Billion in 4 Minutes (1976).
biography.name: Paul Oxon

biography.bio: Umberto Raho was born on June 4, 1922 in Bari, Puglia, Italy. He was an actor, known for The Last Man on Earth (1964), L'oiseau au plumage de cristal (1970) and Darling (1965). He died on January 9, 2016 in Anzio, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Umberto Raho

biography.bio: Raymond Bussières was born on November 3, 1907 in Ivry-la-Bataille, Eure, Haute-Normandie, France. He was an actor and writer, known for The King and the Mockingbird (1980), Paris When It Sizzles (1964) and Casque d'Or (1952). He was married to Annette Poivre. He died on April 29, 1982 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Raymond Bussières

biography.bio: Filippo Antonelli is an actor, known for Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity (1971), Tiger from River Kwai (1975) and The Stranger Returns (1967).
biography.name: Filippo Antonelli

biography.bio: Antonio Buonomo is an actor, known for The Tunnel (1980) and Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity (1971).
biography.name: Antonio Buonomo
